com.concordium.sdk.transactions.tokens

Interface TokenOperation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransferTokenOperation

    public interface TokenOperation
    A protocol-level token (PLT) operation used in TokenUpdate.

    To deserialize an operation from CBOR, always use TokenOperation.class even if you know the exact type.

    See Also:
    CBOR Schemas, TransferTokenOperation as an example of a CBOR-serializable token operation
